JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:  05 /01/2011 
 
 
AVSEC ORDER No. 01 /2011 
 
 
Subject:-  AVSEC Training by CASO/GOs /Supervisory Staff of  ASG/APSU 
 
 
 
Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation), Bureau of Civil Aviation 
Security, in exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of The Aircraft Act, 1934, 
(22 of 1934 ) delegated to him vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil 
Aviation, Notification SO No. 1797 issued under reference AV-11012/006/97-A 
dated 03.07.1997 specified in sub clauses (e) and (f) of sub section (2) of section 
(5) of the said Act, in the interest of securing of India or for the security of 
aircraft operations directs that,  
 
i) 
CASOs/Gazetted Officers/  Superisory Officers of CISF or State 
Police shall undergo 10 days AVSEC Basic Course approved by BCAS, 
within three months of their induction in ASG/APSU; and 
 
ii) 
The presently posted officers, who have not undergone the above 
mentioned course, are required to successfully undergo this course within 
the next three months of issue of this order; and 
 
 
 
2. 
This order will be implemented by all concerned with immediate effect, 
violation of which shall attract legal action under section 11A of The Aircraft 
Act, 1934. 
 
 
 
( Gurjot Singh Malhi ) 
Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution : As per standard list attached.
